user_action_and_explanation: type "reverie" into the search bar with the placeholder "Search English—Chinese (Traditional)" to find the definition and pronunciation details from Cambridge Dictionary.
observation: The user successfully searched for the word "reverie" on the Cambridge Dictionary. The definition provided is "(a state of having) pleasant dream-like thoughts." The UK pronunciation is shown as /ˈrev.ər.i/ and the US pronunciation is /ˈrev.ɚ.i/. An example sentence from the dictionary is: "He was lost in reverie until he suddenly heard someone behind him."
